message.body: Yesterday was cold. Even for me. I haven't been out today yet
I'm assuming its still damn cold
Well it was cold yesterday so we didn't go to the parks.

It was really nice the other day when we were at Hogwarts though. It was almost 80 degrees and I miss it! Today got cold again. We got to Epcot and parked the car, but we went back and drove back to the hotel to put on more layers because it was sooo cold here. Then again, I probably can't complain that much compared to what's going on up there.
Aw you miss Philly? Haha I'm the same way.
We're you suck. Yes I do. As nice, fun and fantastical as Disney/Universal is, there's no place like home ;)
I know. No place like home. Though I have to go to Epcot some day.
And yeah I was sick. Remember New Year's Eve?
Oh yea. Yea! I was telling Vy that I'm lolling forward to the day that you all would come here cause I think you would really enjoy the World Showcase. Get to practice your language-speaking skills!
Have to get some of you on a plane first.
I know. I would love tha
I know you would. That's why I said it!
